member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_SHADER_CONFIG
member.summary: A state subobject that represents a shader configuration.

member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_SHADER_CONFIG.MaxPayloadSizeInBytes
member.summary: The maximum storage for scalars (counted as 4 bytes each) in ray payloads in raytracing pipelines that contain this program.

member.name: D3D12_RAYTRACING_SHADER_CONFIG.MaxAttributeSizeInBytes
member.summary: The maximum number of scalars (counted as 4 bytes each) that can be used for attributes in pipelines that contain this shader. The value cannot exceed D3D12_RAYTRACING_MAX_ATTRIBUTE_SIZE_IN_BYTES.
